KnowledgeBase.Title: Example BitVector compareLT 014
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareGT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLT function to compare two Vectors and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding values of each Vector are compared to determine whether one Vector is lesser than the other.

Syntax.Note: The first BitVector is greater than the second BitVector.
